lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay right wing Ryan Callahan will miss Game 6 against Montreal on Tuesday after undergoing an emergency appendectomy. The Lightning lead the series, 3-2.

headline.main: Lightning Will Be Without Callahan for Game 6

snippet: Tampa Bay right wing Ryan Callahan will miss Game 6 against Montreal on Tuesday after undergoing an emergency appendectomy. The Lightning lead the series, 3-2.
